android.name: HPN Exclusive Trailer
android.content:
Make some Noise for the Biggest Blockbuster of the year. Humble Politicann Nograj. 
 The Cinema revolves around the subject of Indian Politics and gives a strong message. 
Saad and Danish have teamed up to tickle your funny Bone.
 So Ladiyus and GentluMennu, Get Ready! Catch all the Action.

android.name: HPN - Danish Interview
android.content: Checkout what Danish Sait, the Humbalest Politicann feels about the making of the movie. Also, he spills out few beans about the storyLine.

android.name: TOI Interview - Herd of BORAT.
android.content: The makers say that it depicts the crooked journey of manipulative politician Nograj, who is already infamous thanks to social-media platforms. 'Nograj will deal with current political scenarios in authentic locations and there is nothing funnier than seeing a caricatured politician create a wacky world and pull citizens into it,' says Hemanth, adding that this film will be different and will give viewers a Borat-like experience.

android.name: Danish is in Tears.
android.content: After the release of HPN Trailer, Danish Tweeted @DanishSait - The first look teaser of #HPN üôèüèª From prank calls on the radio to this ... YOU are the reason üòä Much love!
